definition: many times/on more than one occasion
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time

sentences.english: More than once I've felt my heart slip a cog.
sentences.chinese: 我不止一次感到心臟突然停跳一下。

sentences.english: Kids, there's more than one story of how I met your mother.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們，在我遇到你老媽前風流韻事不止一次。

sentences.english: He hit her, possibly more than once. She had multiple bruises.
sentences.chinese: 他打她，好像不止一次，她身上有多處的淤傷。

sentences.english: I highly recommend this book for every software manager to read - more than once.
sentences.chinese: 我不止一次地向每一位軟件經理強烈推薦此書。

sentences.english: Lindsay has flashed onlookers a number of times in cars and clubs.
sentences.chinese: 林賽不止一次在酒吧或車裏與觀衆曖昧而被偷拍。

sentences.english: I’ve fought all of these enemies at one time or another.
sentences.chinese: 我跟所有這些敵人都交鋒過不止一次。

sentences.english: Nearly three-quarters of individuals reporting a bribe said they had been asked for bribes more than once.
sentences.chinese: 將近四分之三的檢舉者稱受到不止一次的索賄。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, athwart this revery into which he had fallen he had heard for some time a peculiar noise.
sentences.chinese: 這時，在夢幻中，他不止一次聽見一種奇怪的聲音。

sentences.english: More than once I saw [the owner] kick him for no reason at all.
sentences.chinese: 艾倫說，“我不止一次看到主人無原無故就踢它。”

sentences.english: It stands ready to smite once and smite no more.
sentences.chinese: 它會不止一次的發出攻擊。

sentences.english: I was able to use the knowledge I gained in Posen more than once to get out of dangerous situations.
sentences.chinese: 我不止一次利用我在波森學到的知識脫離危險。

sentences.english: Well, I don't have to call printf just once.
sentences.chinese: 我們這次可能會不止一次調用printf函數。

sentences.english: Or stare atu like now, waiting for u to say something more?
sentences.chinese: 不止一次，你跟我說過，我對你來說很重要。

sentences.english: I mention more than once , I believe all classmates know now .
sentences.chinese: 我不止一次兩次的提到，我相信現在全班同學都知道。
這種事情發生了不止一次。

sentences.english: Yes, we had more than one of those experiences.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我們這樣的經歷不止一次。

definition: once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
once/already/ever (in the past)/former/previously/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
to speak bluntly (idiom)/not to mince words
one's own mouth/fig. in one's own words/to say sth personally
